welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Channahon, where small town charm meets big city adventure! Get ready to explore our beautiful parks, scenic trails, and experience the famous Midwestern hospitality during your stay. Enjoy your time here and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal is primarily used for private and charter flights, and offers a more exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
